GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of single article found by article ID

GET /api/articles/:articles_id.description: serves an object of comments for a specific article

comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts comment on article and returns with comment object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates votes on article, incrementing them by a number using the key inc_votes

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes comment based on comment_id given
